DOC.brief_summary: Propionibacterium acne common pathogen identify surgical site infection shoulder . Standard skin prep prevent type infection . Patients undergo either chlorhexidine benzoyl peroxide prep day lead surgery . Bacterial burden determine time surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Skin Prep Reduce Postoperative Shoulder Infection
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 Indicated shoulder surgery History previous shoulder infection Allergy Chlorhexidine benzoyl peroxide Current use antiacne medicine around shoulder Patient pregnant concern pregnancy
